list.abs: To prey on victim like a famished tiger ., 饿虎扑食.
last Wednesday , a squadron of incense vendors surged around visitors and the Liu family noodle shop was doing a the famished .上周三，一群香火贩围着旅客贩卖香火，刘家面馆也忙活着为饥饿的旅客们准备面条。
The famished boy tore into his dinner ., 这个饿极了的男孩晚餐时狼吞虎咽.

means.word_mean: 1. a state of extreme hunger resulting from lack of essential nutrients over a prolonged period
